<style>
.hover-card {
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
  cursor: pointer;
  min-height: 250px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.hover-card .card-body {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

.hover-card .expandable-content {
  max-height: 0;
  opacity: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: max-height 0.3s ease, opacity 0.3s ease;
}

/* Hover functionality for desktop */
@media (hover: hover) {
  .hover-card:hover .expandable-content {
    max-height: 300px;
    opacity: 1;
  }

  .hover-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
  }
}

/* Click functionality for mobile/touch devices */
.hover-card.expanded .expandable-content {
  max-height: 300px;
  opacity: 1;
}

.hover-card.expanded {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
}

.card-header {
  padding: 0.5rem 0.5rem !important;
  line-height: 1.3 !important;
}
</style>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Add click handlers for mobile/touch devices
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.hover-card');
  
  cards.forEach(card => {
    card.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      // Only handle clicks on touch devices or when hover is not supported
      if (window.matchMedia('(hover: none)').matches) {
        e.preventDefault();
        
        // Toggle expanded state
        if (this.classList.contains('expanded')) {
          this.classList.remove('expanded');
        } else {
          // Close other expanded cards first
          cards.forEach(otherCard => {
            if (otherCard !== this) {
              otherCard.classList.remove('expanded');
            }
          });
          
          // Expand this card
          this.classList.add('expanded');
        }
      }
    });
  });
});
</script>
